tweet: This @OpenLawOfficial demo shows how simple it is to connect legal contracts with real world fiat currencies using Chainlink. #smartcontracts  https://t.co/ehUWTchvJi

Just a PSA for all those Ripple fans who think SWIFT is just going to roll over and die while XRP takes over in it's place...  SWIFT is going to implement ChainLink to settle bank to bank transfers in real time using smart contracts and an oracle solution. #LINK #XRP
interesting. Video: OpenLaw Demo of ChainLink Integration in US Dollars  https://t.co/lFBfeVdWoS via @ArtificialLawya
